messages.body:
CHARLES  EZEH AND ASSOCIATES
40 ABIODUN STR.
VICTORIA ISLAND,
LAGOS, NIGERIA.

Dear Sir/Madam,

l am a financial consultant based in Lagos, Nigeria.l have a client (widow) she has $12,000,000 with a Private Equity Investment Trust Company for safekeeping. And she is willing to offer you 20% of the total fund if you can assist her transfer this fund to your country or any bank of your wish.She wishes to invest in a stable economy.

Her interest is in companies with potentials for rapid growth in long terms. My client is interested in placing part of her fund in your company,if your country`s bi-laws allows foreign investment.

Thanks as you respond.

Regards,

CHARLES  EZEH

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail Stroganov,
  
 Thanks for replying my mail , i want to start by
 introducing  who my client is, she is the Wife of
 the last Civilian Governor in the then Bendel State
 of Nigeria, before the military took over Government
 by force which led to the  State being divided into
 two Delta State and Edo State and the arrest of my
 client's Husband Late Prof. Ambrose Ali, he was
 jailed for over ten years before his death in the
 prison. Since then the military Government seized
 all his Estate to the extent that my client, Mrs.
 Patience Ali has to run away for her dear life to
 one of our neigbouring country Cameroon for safety,
 untill 1999 that the present civilian Government
 came into Power that she came back to Nigeria to
 fight for her Husband's Estate, which the matter is
 now with the Federal House of Assembly.
  
 Meanwhile, my client's Husband Deposited the
 US$12,000.000.00 (twelve Million United State of
 American Dollars) with Equity Trust House for
 safekeeping which my client has the Deposit
 Certificate under her disposal.
  
 I want to assure you that this business is very
 legal and all that we will be doing as regard this
 business is also legitimate, so that it does not
 contradict any international or local law.
  
  I really want to know if you can handle this
 business? because the money involved is much and
 also, I want to deal with you base on trust and hope
 you will not betray the trust because business
 relationship is about trust and honesty.
  
  We need to carry out some legal documentation with
 your detail information, your full name and address
 is required for change of ownership and
 normalisation of documents in your name as the
 beneficiary of funds,  so that you will be
 recognised as the new beneficiary of the funds with
 the Equity Trust House,  my client has  promised to
 take care of all legal documentation as regard this
 transaction because of the happening around the
 world today so that we can have a smooth
 transaction, and again, i want you to know that any
 money above USD$10,000  is not allowed to leave the
 shore of my country because of the new government
 policy to check money lundary and government money
 being looted out, and  base on this, the funds can
 not be transfered through bank to bank.
  
 Inview of this,  the Manager of Equity Trust House
 has arrange  another means to move the funds out of
 the country, inform of consignment  through a
 diplomatic means to Europe,where the delegated
 Equity trust House officials will receive it on your
 behalf from the Diplomat and call you so as to
 enable you meet with them to sign the fund release
 document and the funds will be released to you.
  
  I advice, you should start making arrangement on
 how you will receive them to finish this business
 for us next week,so let me know your readiness in
 other to start off with the process of all the legal
 documentation in your name asap. 
  
 Mikhail Stroganov, call me  for more informations on
 my # 234-804-515-7693. Your telephone and mobile
 numbers is required for easy communications.
  
 I wait for your response,
  
 Charles Ezeh
messages.raw:
CHARLES EZEH

Dear Mikhail Stroganov,

Thanks for replying my mail , i want to start by introducing who my client is, she is the Wife of the last Civilian Governor in the then Bendel State of Nigeria, before the military took over Government by force which led to the State being divided into two Delta State and Edo State and the arrest of my client's Husband Late Prof. Ambrose Ali, he was jailed for over ten years before his death in the prison. Since then the military Government seized all his Estate to the extent that my client, Mrs. Patience Ali has to run away for her dear life to one of our neigbouring country Cameroon for safety, untill 1999 that the present civilian Government came into Power that she came back to Nigeria to fight for her Husband's Estate, which the matter is now with the Federal House of Assembly.

Meanwhile, my client's Husband Deposited the US$12,000.000.00 (twelve Million United State of American Dollars) with Equity Trust House for safekeeping which my client has the Deposit Certificate under her disposal.

I want to assure you that this business is very legal and all that we will be doing as regard this business is also legitimate, so that it does not contradict any international or local law.

I really want to know if you can handle this business? because the money involved is much and also, I want to deal with you base on trust and hope you will not betray the trust because business relationship is about trust and honesty.

We need to carry out some legal documentation with your detail information, your full name and address is required for change of ownership and normalisation of documents in your name as the beneficiary of funds, so that you will be recognised as the new beneficiary of the funds with the Equity Trust House, my client has promised to take care of all legal documentation as regard this transaction because of the happening around the world today so that we can have a smooth transaction, and again, i want you to know that any money above USD$10,000 is not allowed to leave the shore of my country because of the new government policy to check money lundary and government money being looted out, and base on this, the funds can not be transfered through bank to bank.

Inview of this, the Manager of Equity Trust House has arrange another means to move the funds out of the country, inform of consignment through a diplomatic means to Europe,where the delegated Equity trust House officials will receive it on your behalf from the Diplomat and call you so as to enable you meet with them to sign the fund release document and the funds will be released to you.

I advice, you should start making arrangement on how you will receive them to finish this business for us next week,so let me know your readiness in other to start off with the process of all the legal documentation in your name asap.

Mikhail Stroganov, call me for more informations on my # 234-804-515-7693. Your telephone and mobile numbers is required for easy communications.

I wait for your response,

Charles Ezeh

  your full name and address  is required for change
  of ownership and  normalisation of documents in
 your
  name as the  beneficiary of funds.
   
  After which i will send you a copy of sworn
  affidavit from our Federal High Court of Justice
  hear in Nigeria and the Deposit Certificate for
 your

  Moreso, you will be  recognised as the new
  beneficiary of the funds with  the Equity Trust
  House,  my client has  promised to  take care of
 all
  legal documentation as regard this  transaction
  because of the happening around the  world today
 so
  that we can have a smooth  transaction.
  Meanwhile, attach is my client's  Picture for your
  perusal.
   
  Please, i want you to send tome your telephone,
 fax
  and mobile numbers for easy communications.
   
  Thanks,
   
  Charles Ezeh.

your full name and address is required for change of ownership and normalisation of documents in your name as the beneficiary of funds.

After which i will send you a copy of sworn affidavit from our Federal High Court of Justice hear in Nigeria and the Deposit Certificate for your perusal.

Moreso, you will be recognised as the new beneficiary of the funds with the Equity Trust House, my client has promised to take care of all legal documentation as regard this transaction because of the happening around the world today so that we can have a smooth transaction. Please, i want you to send tome your telephone, fax and mobile numbers for easy communications.

Charles Ezeh.

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail,
  
 Thanks for your urgent response, i really appreciate
 the effort shown so far concerning my proposal to
 you.
  
 Be informed, that i will be going to court tomorrow
 with the detailed informations you sent to me for a
 sworn affidevit of transfer of ownership in your
 favour as the beneficiary of the funds, and i will
 be sending the Deposit Certificate along side with
 the Sworn Affidevit.
  
 Please, send me your telephone, fax and mobile
 number, because my client will like to speak to you.
  
 Chears,
  
 Charles Ezeh

Charles Ezeh

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail, 
  
 Attach is the Certificate of Deposit of the funds.
  
 Thanks for your e-mail this afternoon, I want to let
 you know that i have successfully gotten a Sworn
 Affidevit of Transfer of Ownership today in your
 Name as the beneficiary of the funds.
  
 Please, know that as from now onwards, the Equity
 Trust  House will be dealling with you as the owner
 of the funds, meanwhile, i have submited the Sworn
 Affidevit that gives you the right as the owner of
 the funds to Equity Trust House for normalization.
  
 Mikhail, keep me informed as soon as you hear from
 Equity Trust House on when the consignment will
 leave to Europe .
  
 Thanks,
  
 Charles Ezeh

Please, know that as from now onwards, the Equity Trust House will be dealling with you as the owner of the funds, meanwhile, i have submited the Sworn Affidevit that gives you the right as the owner of the funds to Equity Trust House for normalization.

Thanks,

Charles Ezeh

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail,
  
 I don't understand what you mean, by saying that the
 Document i sent to you looks Amature.Please explain
 what you mean?
  
 Anyway, i want to let you know that i went to Equity
 Trust House today to know what is happening, and the
 Manager made me to understand that the Diplomat will
 be leaving  tomorrow night with the consignment to
 Netherland, so be prepare to meet with them at
 Holland to claim the funds from them as the original
 Beneficiary of the funds.
  
 Mikhail, let me know ASAP if you are ready to meet
 with them or not, because i will not want a
 situation wereby the funds will leave to Holland
 without any body coming to claim it, because the way
 you are sounding it looks as if you are up to
 something, let me know your stand?
  
 Thanks,
  
 Charles
messages.raw:
CHARLES EZEH

Dear Mikhail,

I don't understand what you mean, by saying that the Document i sent to you looks Amature.Please explain what you mean?

Anyway, i want to let you know that i went to Equity Trust House today to know what is happening, and the Manager made me to understand that the Diplomat will be leaving tomorrow night with the consignment to Netherland, so be prepare to meet with them at Holland to claim the funds from them as the original Beneficiary of the funds.

Mikhail, let me know ASAP if you are ready to meet with them or not, because i will not want a situation wereby the funds will leave to Holland without any body coming to claim it, because the way you are sounding it looks as if you are up to something, let me know your stand?

Thanks,

Charles

messages.body:
THOMAS
